attributes.action: Ban American Ticket Touts From Buying Our Tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly American ticket touts are buying up UK tickets to sell on ebay. Maybe there isn't much that can be done to stop UK touts but stopping foreigners from exploiting our fans should be simple enough. UK tickets for UK music fans!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
